§ 1738. Establishment of Facility There is established in the Department of the Treasury an entity to be known as the “Enterprise for the Americas Facility” (hereafter referred to in this subchapter as the “Facility”). (July 10, 1954, ch. 469, title VI, § 601, as added Pub. L. 101–624, title XV, § 1512, Nov. 28, 1990, 104 Stat. 3658.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSubchapter effective Jan. 1, 1991, see section 1513 of Pub. L. 101–624, set out as an Effective Date of 1990 Amendment note under section 1691 of this title.
